
The fish Command Line for Fluidinfo
***********************************

**Overview**

* An Overview of the fish Command Line for Fluidinfo
* Shell-Fish: The Online version of Fish
**Commands**

* tag
* untag
* show
* tags
* count
* ls
* perms
* rm
* touch
* mkns
* mkdir
* pwd
* pwn
* su
* amazon
* help
* commands
* version
* test

* Using Unix-Like Paths
